title: Public Records and Meetings/Chief of Domestic Security
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Public Records and Meetings/Chief of Domestic Security;  Providing an exemption from public records requirements for certain information held by the Chief of Domestic Security and any information in a certain notification which would reveal information critical to state or national security; providing an exemption from public meetings requirements for portions of meetings which would reveal such exempt information; providing for future legislative review and repeal of the exemptions; providing a statement of public necessity, etc.

actions.description: Referred to Judiciary; Appropriations Committee on Criminal and Civil Justice; Fiscal Policy
